description.lang: Flood Sensor is capable of both detecting leaks and floods and when the level of water gets too low in pool or tank, Flood Sensor can work with your z-wave network to prevent emergencies such as burst water boiler to leaking air conditioners. With Z-Wave, the scope to save money is endless.The features list:1)Z-Wave Plus certified for wide compatibility (500 serials product).2)Security 0 and security 2 framework implemented with AES-128 encryption.3)Contains an extension water detecting probe. 4)Temperature measurement.5)Vibration sensor.6)The battery life is up to 1 year. 7)Low battery alert

Z-Wave Plus Lifeline:1. Notification Report.Sensor will send Notification Report to the associated nodes 2. Battery Report.Sensor will send Battery Report when the battery level is low and the battery reports value is 0xFF.3. Device Reset Locally Notification.Sensor will send Device Reset Locally Notification when reset4.Sensor multilevel reportWhen associated to Group 1, you can adjust the temperature reporting cycle according to the configuration settings.
1. Basic Set.Flood Sensor will send Basic Set to associated nodes when Water leak detected.
Flood sensor can send BASIC SET command to nodes associated with group 2.
Disable
Enable
Flood sensor can reverse its value of BASIC SET when flooding is triggered.
Send BASIC SET VALUE = 255 to nodes associated with group 2 when flooding alarm is triggered.Send BASIC SET VALUE = 0 to nodes associated with group 2 when flooding alarm is canceled.
Send BASIC SET VALUE = 0 to nodes associated with group 2 when flooding alarm is triggered.Send BASIC SET VALUE = 255 to nodes associated with group 2 when flooding alarm is canceled.
Disable flooding alarm
The higher the value, the long the report periodically - in hexadecimal values from 0x01 to 0xFF, or 1 to 255 if your controller allows unsigned decimal values.
when the value is 0, the product will not sends a vibration alarm after moving or shaking; when the value is 1, the product will sends a vibration alarm after moving or shaking
The temperature changes at least 1 degree Celsius before reported.
the higher the value ,the long the report time

name.lang: Set the high temperature alarm trigger value

description.lang: The precision of the temperature value is 1.Available settings(US):-670 - 2570-67257FAvailable settings(Other):-550 - 1250-55125CDefault setting (US): 1040 (104F)Default setting (Other): 400(40C)
the larger the value , the higher the high temperature(US)
the larger the value , the higher the high temperature(other)

name.lang: Set the low temperature alarm trigger value

description.lang: The precision of the temperature value is 1.Available settings(US):-670 - 2570-67257FAvailable settings(Other):-550 - 1250-55125CDefault setting (US): 320 (32F)Default setting (Other): 0 (0C)
the smaller the value , the lower the low temperature(US)
the smaller the value , the lower the low temperature(other)

name.lang: Enable/Disable blinking LED when alarm being triggered

description.lang: 0 Disable.1 Enable.
when the value is 0, the product will not alarm when being triggered; when the value is 1, the product will alarm when being triggered
This parameter defines a battery level as the low battery.Available settings: 10-50 (10% - 50%)Default setting: 20 (20%)
Set the trigger value for the low battery alarm
